sentences.en: a school governor
sentences.cn: 学校董事

sentences.en: Duke was soundly defeated in this month's Louisiana governor's race.
sentences.cn: 杜克在本月的路易斯安那州长竞选中大败而归。

sentences.en: Governor Caperton has the largest campaign war chest.
sentences.cn: 卡珀顿州长筹得的竞选资金数额最大。

sentences.en: Governor William Livingston addressed the New Jersey Assembly.
sentences.cn: 威廉·利文斯顿州长在新泽西州议会上发表了演说。

sentences.en: He defeated the incumbent governor by a large plurality.
sentences.cn: 他以压倒多数票击败了现任州长.

sentences.en: He is a candidate for the office of Governor.
sentences.cn: 他是州长候选人之一。

sentences.en: He was governor of Iowa in the late 1970s.
sentences.cn: 他是20世纪70年代末爱荷华州的州长。

sentences.en: He was widely respected as a wise and statesmanlike governor.
sentences.cn: 他作为一位睿智、具备政治家才干的州长而广受尊崇。

sentences.en: In some states, my governor friends took care of it.
sentences.cn: 在一些州，我的州长朋友们帮我解决了这事。

sentences.en: Mr. John was inducted into the office of governor.
sentences.cn: 约翰先生正式就任州长.

sentences.en: The choice of Governor may confound us all.
sentences.cn: 州长的选择可能会让我们所有人感到困惑。

sentences.en: the former governor of the colony
sentences.cn: 该殖民地的前总督

sentences.en: The governor also expressed concerned over the deteriorating standard of education in the country.
sentences.cn: 这位地方长官对该国不断恶化的教育标准也表达了忧虑。

sentences.en: The governor was forced to parley with the rebels.
sentences.cn: 州长被迫与反叛者谈判.

sentences.en: The Governor will appear before the committee next Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 下周二，州长将接受委员会的质询。

sentences.en: The governor's action freezes 300,000 accounts.
sentences.cn: 州长采取的行动冻结了30万个账户。

sentences.en: the hospital’s board of governors
sentences.cn: 医院的董事会

sentences.en: The incident was reported to the prison governor.
sentences.cn: 这一事件已汇报给监狱长。

sentences.en: The new governor dismissed the staff that served his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 新州长将前任州长的职员全部解雇.

sentences.en: the prison governor
sentences.cn: 监狱长

sentences.en: They must choose between two evenly matched candidates for governor.
sentences.cn: 他们必须在两位不相上下的州长候选人之间作出选择。

words.tran_cn: 可控制的；可支配的；可统治的
有统治、控制或治理权力的
政府的；政治的；统治上的
州长或总督等的职位；州长或总督等的任期

phrases.tran_cn: 电子调速器；电子自动调速器
（大英帝国国协内独立国家或殖民地等的）总督

trans.tran_cn: 主管人员，统治者，管理者，<美>州长，[机]节速器，调节器
trans.tran_en: the person in charge of governing a state in the US
